Room.Name: Hollow Log
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside a hollow log, perhaps twenty meters in length.
Room.LongDescription: The west end of the log is the small end, and the entrance is overgrown with heavy brush. The eastern end is open, and a large garden can be seen in that direction. Small animals have made thier homes in here, and your passage sends them scurrying toward the dark end of the log.
